detail_desc: Nylon baseball jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. One inner pocket. Lined.
Velour playsuit with lace details, a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and wide 3/4-length sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and wide wrapover legs with open sides.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

V-neck playsuit in a glittery-patterned viscose weave with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the top. Short sleeves with a frill that continues down the sides, an elasticated seam with a drawstring and frill at the waist and short legs. Unlined.
Jacket in soft washed denim with a collar, and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs.
Jacket in soft washed denim with a collar, and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs.
Short, straight-cut dress in a textured weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length puff sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a textured weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length puff sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar and fastening down the front. Lined.
Padded gilet with a stand-up collar and fastening down the front. Lined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with an elasticated edge. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and elastication at the hem. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with an elasticated edge. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and elastication at the hem. Lined.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood, a zip down the front, fake front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Cotton lining.
Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with long sleeves with wide, flared cuffs with a slit and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Ankle-length suit trousers in sturdy jersey with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and tapered legs with decorative seams.
Trousers in an airy weave made from a premium cotton blend with a paper bag waist and drawstring. Zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Short, fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, shoulder pads, long sleeves with a decorative button at the cuffs and decorative covered buttons at the hem.
Non-wired bralette in lace with lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Non-wired bra top in stretch fabric with a mesh racer back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seamless.
Non-wired bra top in stretch fabric with a mesh racer back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seamless.
Suspender belt made of elastic straps with a wrapover front. Detachable straps at the bottom and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace body with a deep V-neck, short cap sleeves, a seam at the hips and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Longer, oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Double, adjustable spaghetti straps, wide elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in an airy, textured weave with a glittery print, gathers at the top,draping at the front and a yoke at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, narrow elastication and draped details around the waist and a gathered, bell-shaped skirt. Lined.

Jacket in water-repellent cotton with a detachable hood, press-studs at the top and a zip down one side. Elastication around the hood and cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
